data: A brooch blessed by the wind. When passing through the grass, briefly increase your movement speed by 10%.
When out of battle or passing through grass, the movement speed increases by 【 value1 】%, and this effect will last for an additional 【 value2 】 seconds after it expires
Humanized design  Even if hit, there is no need to remove shrapnel!
When a general attack hits an enemy, its movement speed will briefly decrease.
When a general attack hits an enemy, its movement speed will briefly decrease [value1 | A] and continue [value2].
General attack deals 50% more damage to enemies with full health.
General attack deals 【 value1 | A 】 times damage to enemies with full health.
General attack deals 20% more damage to enemies with less than half health.
General attack deals [value1 | A] times damage to enemies with less than half their health.
Because I'm afraid of pain, I have full defense.
When the health is full, additional shield values can gradually accumulate within 10 seconds.
When the health is full, additional shield values can gradually accumulate within 【 value1 】 seconds, up to the maximum 【 value2 | A 】 health limit.
When the health is less than half, the damage is increased by 10%.
When the health is less than half, the damage increases by [value1 | A].
The guardian god is watching over you.
When suffering fatal injuries, avoid death and retain 1 point of health. Each round can only trigger once.
When dealing fatal damage, immune damage lasts for 【 value1 】 seconds. Each battle can be triggered once.

Mark the target hit by the general attack, [value1] seconds later, add a bullet in the direction of the target, deal [value2] damage

When a general attack hits an enemy, the movement speed briefly increases by 20%.
When a general attack hits an enemy, briefly increase your own movement speed [value1 | A] for [value2] seconds.

After defeating the enemy, immediately fill the anger tank.

After releasing the ultimate move, briefly increase the damage by 【 value1 | A 】 for 【 value2 】 seconds.
No one would refuse this scarf in winter.
After dealing damage to the enemy, briefly increase defense by -15% of the damage received.
After dealing damage to the enemy, briefly increase your own defense and reduce the damage received [value1 | A].
This giant beast hated being disturbed during its lifetime.
For every enemy nearby, the damage is increased by 3%. (Maximum+15%)
For every enemy nearby, the damage increases by [value1 | A]. (Highest+【 value2 | A 】)

After obtaining the energy block, briefly increase your own damage [value1 | A] and movement speed [value2 | A] for [value3] seconds.

Every time you receive damage, there is a 30% chance to recover 30 points of general attack energy.
Every time you receive damage, there is a chance for [value1 | A] to restore [value2] points of general attack energy.
Special skill  Launch Flying Claw to bring the captured enemy in front of you!
Special skill  Launch Flying Claw, deal [value1] damage, and pull the captured enemy in front of you!
Release cold air during general attack, slow down enemies and deal damage. (Can be triggered every 5 seconds)

It is said that this treasure can trigger the user's internal power.
After charging, the general attack deals 1.15 times the damage to the target and enemies behind the target. (Charging takes 12 seconds, up to 2 layers can be charged)

When fully charged, the next general attack can penetrate the target enemy and inflict additional [value1 | A] damage on this target. Get 1 layer of charging every 【 value2 】 seconds, up to a maximum of 【 value3 】 layers can be stacked.
Attacking will cause an additional 10% damage to the enemy's current health. (Can be triggered every 5 seconds)
Every time damage is dealt, it deals additional damage to the enemy's current health [value1 | A]. Built in cooling [value2] seconds.
Special skill  deals damage to surrounding enemies and puts them in an ionized state. Enemies in an ionized state will deduct additional energy after using their skills.

Special skill  deals [value1] damage to surrounding enemies and puts them in an ionized state [value2] seconds. Enemies in ionized state will deduct 【 value3 】 general attack energy after using their skills.

When a general attack hits an enemy, briefly increase movement speed by 10%. (Can be triggered every 8 seconds)

When dealing damage with a regular attack, if the enemy has one negative state, the damage will increase by [value1 | A], up to a maximum of [value2 | A].

When a general attack hits an enemy, restore a small amount of general attack energy [value1]. This effect can be triggered every 【 value2 】 seconds.
